title: Provides condominium owners with access to the application submitted for the tax abatements
summary: Provides condominium owners with access to the application for the entire building for the tax abatements to verify that such owner's unit was included in the submission.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing an owner of a dwelling unit access to tax abatement applications submitted on behalf of the condominium
